categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic fleets

nodes.text: Task Force Organa was a Rebel Alliance task force of the Alliance Fleet that consisted of at least three Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvettes. It was in operation during the Imperial Era and at one point was in the atmosphere of a celestial body with one corvette carrying cargo. The task force shared its name with the House of Organa, an Alderaanian royal family that supported the Rebel Alliance and helped create it.
Task Force Organa was first mentioned on a card of the same name in the 2017 Hammerhead Corvettes Expansion Pack for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Armada miniatures game.
